channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oil prices rise after U.S. approves Ukraine use of long-range missiles inside Russia
item.description: Oil futures climbed Monday, headed for their highest finish in more than a week, after a weekend decision by President Joe Biden to allow Ukraine to u...

item.title: Gold Futures Rise on Geopolitical Uncertainty
item.description: Gold futures rose 1.8% to $2,617.00 a troy ounce on macroeconomic concerns.

item.title: Delivery Hero Aims to Raise Around $1.5 Billion in Talabat IPO
item.description: The online delivery company set the share price at about $0.41 to $0.44, for the IPO of 15% of Talabat’s issued share capital.

item.title: ‘I can’t deal with managing them’: I juggle 18 credit cards. How do I close them without ruining my credit score?
item.description: “I have very high limits, so charges barely make a blip on my credit-utilization ratio.”

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures rose, with forecasts pointing to a colder start to December that could lift heating demand.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Mixed
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed, with the Nasdaq inching up, while the S&P 500 and Dow edged lower. Among movers, Tesla and Super Micro Computer shares jumped.

item.title: Euro Might Fall on Weak Eurozone Outlook
item.description: The euro could extend recent losses against the dollar as Donald Trump’s proposed trade tariffs will have a significant impact on the eurozone economy...

item.title: Fight over Trump’s Treasury secretary blamed for some stock-market jitters as candidate pool grows
item.description: Investors need a scorecard to keep track of the array of candidates vying to be President-elect Donald Trump’s Treasury secretary, and that was likely...

item.title: Robinhood poised as ‘major beneficiary’ of Trump’s crypto trading changes: analyst
item.description: A boost is expected from crypto-assets listings, as one analyst flags expected changes to securities laws under a Trump administration.

item.title: Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy after tumultuous period in which two attempted mergers fell through
item.description: Spirit Airlines Inc. filed for a voluntary, pre-arranged Chapter 11 bankruptcy early Monday, capping a tumultuous period for the low-cost airline in w...
